src_original: eko bhūtvā bahūdhā bhavati;  bahudhā bhūtvā eko bhavati;
tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥ prākāram asajjamānena kāyena gacchati,
pṛthivyām unmajjananimajjanaṃ karoti tadyathā udake;  udake abhinnasroto gacchati;  tadyathā pṛthivyām,
imaū vā punaḥ sūryācandramasau evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi; yāvat, (SBV I 117)
